text: Rachel Lardière (born 28 June 1970) is a French Paralympic swimmer who specialises in breaststroke at international level events. She previously practised judo, handball and artistic gymnastics before her accident. Lardière became an incomplete paraplegic in February 1988 following an accident with a pommel horse during a gymnastics training session. She has been using a wheelchair since the accident. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic swimmers of France Category:French female swimmers Category:Female breaststroke swimmers Category:Swimmers at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in swimming Category:Paralympic silver medalists for France
title: Rachel Lardière
